## Output.when property

[Common Expression Language](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/policies/conditions) expressions to evaluate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
when?: OutputExpressions;
```

## Remarks

Requires the Cerbos policy decision point server to be at least v0.33.
